document_data.name: Greentart
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LC/Revenge Is Harder than Stone|3}}
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite organized play/LC/Revenge Is Harder than Stone|19}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Greentart''', or '''Greenmint''', was a thin and fruity [[gnome|gnomish]] pale [[ale]] from the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.Description: Greentart was a slightly tangy alcoholic beverage made with blended [[apple]]s, [[grape]]s, and [[mint]] leaves. It was sometimes served with two highsunfeasts – [[Brick]], or [[Rosto]].
document_data.History: Greentart was a staple of a gnomish out-of-the way café in Ravens Bluff called [[Le PoTeete Café]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It served only gnomish pale ales, with [[Stint]] and [[Rockgrit]] being only alternative libations.
